mapper.select: select datasource_id as id, hour(create_time) as xdata, count(*) as ydata from sys_data_log where DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y%m%d') = #{curDate} group by datasource_id, hour(create_time)
select app_id as id, hour(push_time) as xdata, count(*) as ydata from sys_push_log where DATE_FORMAT(push_time, '%Y%m%d') = #{curDate} group by app_id, hour(push_time)
select datasource_id as id, day(create_time) as xdata, count(*) as ydata from sys_data_log where DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y%m%d') >= #{lastMonthDate} group by datasource_id, day(create_time)
select app_id as id, day(push_time) as xdata, count(*) as ydata from sys_push_log where DATE_FORMAT(push_time, '%Y%m%d') >= #{lastMonthDate} group by app_id, day(push_time)
